ygData.subject: Re: Rubicite replacement armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh it s definitly it. It looks like a PLatinum Bar in fact I was shocked after I killed a MB Clockwork which are pretty rare in themselves I looted it and saw
ygData.messageBody:
Oh it's definitly it. It looks like a PLatinum Bar in fact I was shocked
after I killed a MB Clockwork which are pretty rare in themselves I looted
it and saw this. UNfortunatly I let it stay on the corpse but my partner
looted it he destroyed it later because he ran out of space in backpacks but
he did tell me that it was not no drop.

Again I am 100% positive that this was melatite.

Kananek

-----Original Message-----
From: Avron Elselynn <avron@...>
To: eqpaladin@onelist.com <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, October 16, 1999 1:02 PM
Subject: SV: [eqpaladin] Rubicite replacement armor


>From: "Avron Elselynn" <avron@...>
>
>Is that the metal you need to smith the armor with the molds?
>Is the metal nodrop?
>Please get back to us ASAP! when you have found out if this is indeed what
you think it is...!!! :)
>
>- Avron -
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Dark <dark@...>
>To: <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
>Sent: Sunday, October 17, 1999 2:56 AM
>Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] Rubicite replacement armor
>
>

>> Kananek
